name: Auckland Harbor Cafe
description: Premium waterfront dining experience in the heart of Auckland.

name: Wellington Tech Solutions
description: Expert IT support and software development for local businesses.

name: Christchurch Builders Ltd
description: Reliable residential and commercial construction services.

name: Queenstown Adventures
description: Unforgettable outdoor experiences and guided tours.

name: Hamilton Electric
description: 24/7 electrical services for home and business.

name: Eden Noodles Cafe
description: Famous for authentic Sichuan-style noodles and dumplings. A must-visit for spicy food lovers in Mt Eden.

name: Grand Harbour
description: The gold standard for Yum Cha in Auckland. Authentic Cantonese dining with fresh seafood and over 80 dim sum varieties.
address: Cnr Pakenham St & Viaduct Harbour Ave, Auckland

name: Huami
description: Upscale Chinese dining at SkyCity. Features traditional techniques with modern presentation, specializing in Peking Duck.

name: Ghost Street
description: Hidden underground in Britomart, serving rustic Western Chinese dishes inspired by the night markets of Beijing.

name: Empress Garden
description: A Herne Bay institution known for the best Peking Duck in the city and exceptional service.

name: MASU by Nic Watt
description: Award-winning robata-style Japanese dining in the heart of Auckland, featuring a lively atmosphere and fresh seasonal ingredients.

name: Cocoro
description: Contemporary Japanese cuisine with a focus on fresh, high-quality ingredients and artful presentation. Renowned for its iconic sashimi platter.

name: Ebisu
description: Sleek, industrial-chic space serving modern Japanese dishes that blend traditional techniques with contemporary flavors.

name: Azabu
description: A unique fusion of Japanese and Peruvian (Nikkei) flavors, offering a vibrant and modern dining experience in Ponsonby.

name: Tanuki's Cave
description: An underground izakaya-style bar and restaurant famous for its yakitori, kushiage, and extensive sake selection.

name: Qualified Building Solutions (QBS)
description: Specialists in complex architectural designs and heritage renovations. Known for precision craftsmanship and member of Master Builders.

name: Build Firm
description: Full-service residential construction company specializing in high-end new builds and modern architectural homes.

name: Cain Built
description: Experts in energy-efficient new builds, extensions, and renovations with a 10-year Master Build Guarantee.

name: Radford Builders
description: Focused on high-quality home renovations and extensions across Central Auckland and the Rodney region.

name: NZ Force Construction
description: Reputable builders for both residential and commercial properties, emphasizing honest communication and quality workmanship.

name: Tatsushi
description: Authentic Japanese dining experience focusing on fresh, seasonal ingredients and traditional techniques. Famous for its sashimi and warm hospitality.

name: Kazaguruma Japanese Dining
description: Premium contemporary Japanese dining offering an exquisite Omakase experience and refined seasonal dishes in the heart of Cuba Street.

name: Miyabi
description: A Wellington institution known for its traditional Japanese flavors, cozy atmosphere, and consistent quality since 1997.

name: Origami
description: Creative Japanese fusion restaurant and patisserie, serving unique sushi rolls, ramen, and exquisite handmade desserts.

name: Yoshi Sushi & Bento
description: Modern and fresh Japanese eatery specializing in high-quality sushi rolls, bento boxes, and vibrant Japanese street food.
